title: Impersonal Corporations
excerpt: [digg=http://digg.com/apple/Impersonal_Corporations]It amazes me at just how heartless some corporations can be sometimes. What I mean by that can be easily demonstrated in the now famous case of Apple sending a cease and desist letter to a nine year old girl. If you are unfamiliar with this, let me explain quickly.
